content: Add authentication to critical developer routes (clean-single-payroll, regenerate-all-dates, reset-to-original, audit/log)
Convert sensitive data routes from auth() to withAuth wrapper for proper logging
Add SOC2 logging to user management routes (users/[id], update-profile, update-user-role)
Add SOC2 logging to payroll data routes (payrolls/[id], payroll-dates/[payrollId])
Add SOC2 logging to staff management routes (staff/update-role, staff/invitation-status)
Verify all security fixes and test authentication flows
